price: Lalle ne, waɗanda suka sayi kãfirci da ĩmani, ba zã su cũci Allah da kõme ba. Koma sunã da Azãba mai raɗaɗi.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱشۡتَرَوُاْ ٱلۡكُفۡرَ بِٱلۡإِيمَٰنِ لَن يَضُرُّواْ ٱللَّهَ شَيۡـٔٗاۖ وَلَهُمۡ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٞ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna ish'tarawū al-kuf'ra bil-īmāni lan yaḍurrū al-laha shayan walahum ʿadhābun alīmun
